keyword: how many calories are in chick fil a fries
title: How Many Calories Are in Chick-fil-A Fries?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Chick-fil-A fries for a medium serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving size variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Chick-fil-A Fries?
assumptions: Medium serving (about 125 g) of Waffle Potato Fries, fried in canola oil, as prepared at Chick-fil-A; no added condiments.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, frying oil, and customizations. Check Chick-fil-A app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of Chick-fil-A waffle fries contains about 420 calories and 45 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one packet of Chick-fil-A sauce

faqs.q: How many calories are in a medium Chick-fil-A fries?
What are the macros in Chick-fil-A waffle fries?
faqs.a: Per medium: 20 g fat, 45 g carbs (5 g fiber), 5 g protein.

faqs.q: How does sodium in Chick-fil-A fries compare?
faqs.a: Medium serving has 240 mg sodium, mostly from seasoning and frying.
Yes, the waffle fries are gluten-free, but check for cross-contamination.

faqs.q: Calories in large vs. medium Chick-fil-A fries?
faqs.a: Large has 520 calories, about 100 more than medium.
